sourceMeaningMnemonic: In the <radical>world</radical> of <radical>flowers</radical> and <radical>tree</radical>s, the most important thing is the <kanji>leaf</kanji>. <kanji>Leaves</kanji> are how flowers and trees get their nutrients from the sun!
meaningInfo: Leaves, no matter how little, are the most important thing in the world for them.
readingMnemonic: Picture a little flower working really hard to grow its first leaf. The <kanji>leaf</kanji> pops out and it shouts, "<reading>Ha</reading> (<ja>は</ja>)!"
readingInfo: <ja>は</ja> is the sound of a leaf coming into existence. Whenever you see a plant from now on, hear the little ha sound it makes when each leaf pops out of its body.
